House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08029
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING A NATIONAL COMPREHENSIVE FRAMEWORK ON RESILIENT HOUSING AND HUMAN SETTLEMENTS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides for a framework for the creation of livable, safe, resilient, sustainable and pro-poor housing and human settlements that is structurally designed to resist or absorb the effects of climate hazards.
ALIAS NAME : “Resilient Housing and Human Settlements Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
